Create a socket and connect to the given port on this host.

Parameters:

void SBWOSSocket::receive (  unsigned char *    data,
Integer    length
) 
 

receive data from socket.

Blocks until all request bytes have been received or disconnection occurs.

Parameters:
data  buffer to receive data
length  size of buffer and number of bytes requested.

void SBWOSSocket::transmit (  unsigned char *    data,
Integer    length
) 
 

transmit data to socket.

Blocks until all bytes have been transmitted or disconnection occurs.

Parameters:
data  data to be transmitted.
length  number of bytes to be transmitted.
